title: Compliment to font Abula (Slab-Serif)
content:
What would be a good pairing to the font Abula?

Maybe something in the goggle library for web...

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesketchbook/abula/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417045219/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesketchbook/abula/)

Thanks in advance!
author: zollicreative

comments.content: Headings? Body text? Subject matter? Context?

Yes, we need a ton more info.

hhp

Sorry guys...

Mainly will be used for headings...something to compliment with a sub heading underneath main heading.
So you need a body text typeface?

And the other questions too.  
Fonts are not paintings.

hhp

I was thinking Abula for H1 (large headlines).

And then something to compliment for body headlines and maybe even a sub headline for website...

Does that help?
